Package a3

Class Matrix2

java.lang.Object
a3.Matrix2
public class Matrix2 extends Object
A 2x2 matrix. This class provides basic mathematical operations such as matrix-vector and matrix-matrix products, determinant, and inverse.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Matrix2()
    Initializes this matrix to the identity matrix.
    Matrix2(double a, double b, double c, double d)
    Initializes this matrix so that its entries are equal to the specified values.
    Matrix2(Matrix2 other)
    Initializes this matrix so that it is equal to the specified matrix.

  • Constructor Details

    • Matrix2

      public Matrix2(double a, double b, double c, double d)
      Initializes this matrix so that its entries are equal to the specified values. The matrix entries are defined to be: 
       a b
 c d
      Parameters:
      a - the value of the upper left element
      b - the value of the upper right element
      c - the value of the lower left element
      d - the value of the lower right element

    • Matrix2

      public Matrix2()
      Initializes this matrix to the identity matrix.

    • Matrix2

      public Matrix2(Matrix2 other)
      Initializes this matrix so that it is equal to the specified matrix.
      Parameters:
      other - a matrix to copy

  • Method Details

    • get

      public double get(int row, int col)
      returns the entry of this matrix located at the given one-based row and column indexes
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the element
      col - the column index of the element

      Returns:
      the element at the specified row and column indexes

      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - -if row is not 1 and not 2
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - -if col is not 1 and not 2

    • set

      public Matrix2 set(int row, int col, double val)
      Sets the entry of this matrix located at the given zero-based row and column indexes to the specified value.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the element
      col - the column index of the element
      val - the element to store in this matrix

      Returns:
      a reference to this matrix

      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if row is not 1 and not 2
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if col is not 1 and not2

    • mult

      public ca.queensu.cs.cisc124.notes.basics.geometry.Vector2 mult(ca.queensu.cs.cisc124.notes.basics.geometry.Vector2 v)
      Postmultiply this matrix with the specified column vector returning a new vector

      w = A.mult(v) is equivalent to the mathematical equation w = Av where v and w are 2x1 column vectors.

      Parameters:
      v - a 2x1 vector

      Returns:
      a 2x1 vector equal to this matrix times v

    • mult

      public Matrix2 mult(Matrix2 m)
      Postmultiply this matrix with the specified matrix returning a new matrix.

      {@code C = A.mult(B) is equivalent to the mathematical equation {@code C = AB}. @param m a 2x2 matrix <p> @return a 2x2 matrix equal to this matrix times {@code m}

    • det

      public double det()
      Returns the determinant of this matrix.
      Returns:
      double variable of determinate of this matrix

      Throws:
      ArithmeticException - when determinate is zero

    • inv

      public Matrix2 inv()
      Returns the inverse of this matrix if the determinant of this matrix is not exactly zero.
      Returns:
      the inverse of this matrix

      Throws:
      ArithmeticException - if the determinant of this matrix is exactly zero

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this matrix. The returned string has the following form: 
       [a, b]
 [c, d]

      where a, b, c, and d are the double values of the entries of this matrix.

      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string representation of this matrix
